channel.title: Graardor's melee attack
channel.description:
Hello, i have posted it here as i am not sure if it is client or server sided, for the fact if i do ::pnpc 1115 i become graardor then if i ::emote 7060 i use his punch emote, so it is in there also he uses the proper walk emote and range attack so please help when he uses melee attack he just streches so i assume he is using wrong emote please help.
Edit: Sorry for inprecise info The Emote is in there! because i use it if i do pnpc and emote 7060 secondly i am using delta and thirdly thank you for the help :) if i had rep i would give.
Edit: i am on delta and i still need help, please i will be very gratefull and then once it works 100% i will add a guide on how to make 100% graardor and give you credit
